concept.title: Step 6: Start and stop the client and server

li.p: OpenSSL and ACE_SSL DLLs are built and their locations are in the right environment variables for your system: PATH for Windows, and LD_LIBRARY_PATH for Unix.

ul.li: You have generated the keys and keystores.
You have set the system properties.

conbody.p: For details on stopping and starting locators and cache servers with SSL, see the GemFire Userâ€™s Guide.
